title: Egyptian Fraction Representation
content: A representation of r as a sum of distinct unit fractions 1/nᵢ.

title: Function f(k)
content: f(k) = max{n₁ : ∃ n₁ < ... < nₖ with 1 = Σ 1/nᵢ}. Maximum first denominator.

title: Harmonic Series in Interval
content: Σ_{n=u}^{eu} 1/n ≈ 1. The key identity for the upper bound.

title: Upper Bound (Trivial)
content: f(k) ≤ (1+o(1))·k/(e-1). Follows from harmonic series counting.

title: Croot's Theorem (2001)
content: For any N > 1, ∃ distinct nᵢ in (N, eN] with Σ1/nᵢ = 1. Proves matching lower bound.

title: Why (N, eN]?
content: Interval length (e-1)N, harmonic sum ∫_N^{eN} 1/x dx = ln(e) = 1.

title: Problem Summary
content: SOLVED: f(k) ~ k/(e-1) (Croot 2001). The constant e-1 ≈ 1.718 is optimal.
